name: EXPO Dry Erase Markers, Low Odor Ink, Black, Chisel Tip, 12 Count - Whiteboard, Calendar, Organization, Essential Supplies for Office, School, Classroom, Teachers
short_description: Dry erase markers with the most vibrant ink yet from EXPO
Vibrant ink makes it easier to read information from a distance
Made for the whiteboard and beyond, writing pops on most non-porous surfaces like glass, acrylic, and more!
Easily and cleanly erases with an EXPO eraser or dry cloth
Versatile chisel tip creates multiple line widths
12 count of black markers
product_description: Capture ideas, share information, and organize life with vivid EXPO Dry Erase Markers! Now more vibrant than ever, this collection of EXPO markers helps everything come across clearly—from big ideas to fine details. The presentation markers are made for the whiteboard and beyond with ink that pops on glass, acrylic, and other clear, non-porous surfaces. They’re perfect for planning, presentations, lessons, calendars, home organization, and more! Plus, the wide range of colors of these whiteboard markers add versatility and personalization to any of your marking; you’ll be able to accent with a colorful doodle or sketch if you’re a teacher or parent! With an EXPO eraser or dry cloth, the ink erases cleanly and easily, so there’s little pause in any brainstorm session. And the low odor markers are great for classrooms, offices, and homes!

name: Quartet Dry Erase Markers, Whiteboard Markers, Chisel Tip, EnduraGlide, White Board Dry Erase Pens for Teachers, Home, School & Office Supplies, Assorted Colors, 12 Pack (Q120000ECA)
short_description: BOLD MULTI COLOR: Clearly display your writing with our patented 3 chamber, liquid ink system. Delivers strong bold color every time, to ensure that your message is distinct and legible
EASY TO ERASE: Quickly move from one project to the next with these easy to wipe colorful erase markers. The smooth ink easily wipes away, leaving a clean surface
VERSATILE CHISEL TIP: Create thick or thin lines with the versatile chisel tip. The multipurpose point allows you to customize your message to fit your best needs
COLOR VARIETY SET: Large Pack contains 12 assorted vibrant colors, including Lime Green, Orange, Purple, Neon Blue, Light Blue, Pink, Green, brown, Red, Blue and Black
LOW ODOR: Keep your room clean and odor free. The non toxic, low odor ink is perfect for any environment, such as classrooms, offices and homes
product_description: Quartet EnduraGlide Dry-Erase Markers deliver strong bold color every time, to ensure that your message is distinct and legible. Clearly display your writing with our patented 3-chamber, liquid ink system. Plus, our see-through ink gauge shows exactly how much ink remains for your use. Simply look at the barrel to determine when it’s time to change your marker. Quickly move from one project to the next with these easy to erase markers. Don’t fuss with caked on ink. The smooth ink easily wipes away, leaving a streak-free, clean surface. You can create either thick or thin lines with the versatile chisel tip. The multipurpose point allows you to customize your written message to fit your needs. Pack contains 12 assorted colors, including Black, Red, Blue and Green. Keep your room clean and odor-free. The non-toxic, low odor ink is perfect for any environment, such as classrooms, offices and homes.
